message.content:
There are several ways to stay awake without drinking coffee. Some strategies include:

1. Get enough sleep: Make sure you're getting 7-9 hours of sleep per night, and establish a regular sleep schedule.

2. Take power naps: A quick 20-minute nap during the day can help recharge your brain and keep you alert.

3. Stay hydrated: Drinking plenty of water throughout the day can help improve concentration and reduce fatigue.

4. Eat small, frequent meals: Eating smaller meals more frequently throughout the day may help stabilize blood sugar levels and maintain energy levels.

5 . Stretch or move around regularly: Physical activity promotes alertness by increasing blood flow to the brain; try standing up or going for a brief walk if you start to feel drowsy at work

6 . Expose yourself to sunlight during daylight hours; Natural light exposure can regulate your bodyâ€™s internal clock (or circadian rhythm) so that it has an easier time staying awake when it should be awake
 .

7.Listen to upbeat music: Listening to upbeat songs with high tempos may energize some people, particularly those who already associate certain types of music with focused work periods like studying or exercising

8.Have a good laugh - laugh out loud! This releases endorphines which elevates our mood in turns helps us fight off with tiredness .
